DOC.brief_summary: The aim cohort study observe prevalence , incidence , relapse , remission rate online and/or smartphone game addiction among elementary secondary school student Korea . In addition investigator go identify risk protective factor , determine whether online and/or smart phone game addiction primary secondary problem , identify outcomes individual become stop online smart phone game addiction .
DOC.brief_title: Cohort Study Internet Game Smart Phone Addiction
DOC.detailed_description: Participants : Total 3,000 child enrol cohort follow 4 year . Procedures : These student survey annually 2015 2019 . Surveys conduct classroom train interviewer train research team assist teacher . Measurements - usage frequency internet , internet game , smartphone game etc . - interpersional relationship ; family member , peer group , teacher etc . - personal characteristic ; self esteem , social support , depression , anxiety , hyperactivity etc . - Socio-demographic factor
DOC.criteria: 3rd , 4th , 7th grade student select 15 elementary secondary school provide consent student parent provide consent
